meanings.definition: The quality of being daring or bold.
meanings.sent1: Her daringnesses in trying new things inspired her friends.
meanings.sent2: His daringnesses in facing challenges made him a role model.
meanings.sent3: The cat showed daringnesses by climbing to the top of the tree and refusing to come down.
meanings.sent4: The daringnesses of the firefighter rushing into the burning building amazed everyone.
meanings.sent5: The daringnesses of the acrobat performing high above the crowd left the audience breathless.

meanings.definition: The act of taking risks or being adventurous.
meanings.sent1: Their daringnesses in exploring unknown territories led to exciting discoveries.
meanings.sent2: The daringnesses of the skydivers jumping out of the plane thrilled the spectators.
meanings.sent3: The daringnesses of the chef experimenting with new recipes sometimes resulted in delicious surprises.
meanings.sent4: The daringnesses of the entrepreneur investing in innovative ideas paid off handsomely.
meanings.sent5: The daringnesses of the hiker trekking through the wilderness added an element of thrill to the journey.
